graph TB subgraph Before["❌ Without Event Delegation"] Container1[Container div] Btn1[Button 1] Btn2[Button 2] Btn3[Button 3] Btn4[Button 4] L1[Listener 1] L2[Listener 2] L3[Listener 3] L4[Listener 4] Btn1 --> L1 Btn2 --> L2 Btn3 --> L3 Btn4 --> L4 Problems1[Problems:
